text_raw:

title: further effect to Commission Regulation (EC) No 304 /2008 of 2 April 2008 1,
heading: In these Regulations “Principal Regulations” means the European
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations “Principal Regulations” means the European 
Union (Fluorinated Greenhouse Gas) Regulations 2016 (S.I. No. 658 of 2016). 

Amendment of Principal Regulations
text_norm: 2 regulation principal regulation mean european union (fluorinated greenhouse gas) regulation 2016 (s.i no 658 2016) amendment principal regulation

title: further effect to Commission Regulation (EC) No 304 /2008 of 2 April 2008 1,
heading: 3. The Principal Regulations are amended -
text_raw:
3. The Principal Regulations are amended - 

(a) 

(b) 

in Regulation 12B(3)(a) (amended by Regulation 3(a) of the 
European Union (Fluorinated Greenhouse Gas) (Amendment) 
(No. 2) Regulations 2019 (S.I. No. 534 of 2019 )) by the 
substitution of “11.00 pm on 31 December 2020” for “11.00 pm 
on 31 January 2020”, and 

in Regulation 12J (3)(a) (amended by Regulation 3(c) of the 
European Union (Fluorinated Greenhouse Gas) (Amendment) 
(No. 2) Regulations 2019) by the substitution of “11.00 pm on 
31 December 2020” for “11.00 pm on 31 January 2020”.

31 January 2020. 

RICHARD BRUTON 

Minister for Communications, Climate Action and 
Environment.

title: further effect to Commission Regulation (EC) No 304 /2008 of 2 April 2008 1,
heading: (This note is not part of the Regulations and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Regulations and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

These Regulations amend the European Union (Fluorinated Greenhouse Gas) 
Regulations 2016 (S.I. 658 of 2016) to extend the deadline for recertification 
under those Regulations. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [32] 5
